about_the_game:
Set sail for L.O.L. Surprise! On Vacay. Collect the uniquely fierce fashion dolls and stickers only found on this colorful island paradise!

With new dolls to collect, new challenges to try, new characters to unlock and a brand new stage to perform on, being a L.O.L. Surprise! doll-maker is even more fun on Surf Island. You can even bring your friends on this hula holiday, with 4-player local multiplayer and new minigames to play.

The beaches of Surf Island are waiting for you, so come and write the next fabulous chapter of your L.O.L. Surprise! story!

VISIT SURF ISLAND – Home of tropical new fashions, dolls, and stickers

GO TROPICAL – Unlock special Surf Island characters and costumes

BEACH PARTY! – Have local multiplayer fun with up to 4 friends

TAKE THE STAGE – Surf Island has its own concert stage, minigames, challenges, and more!
detailed_description:
Set sail for L.O.L. Surprise! On Vacay. Collect the uniquely fierce fashion dolls and stickers only found on this colorful island paradise!

With new dolls to collect, new challenges to try, new characters to unlock and a brand new stage to perform on, being a L.O.L. Surprise! doll-maker is even more fun on Surf Island. You can even bring your friends on this hula holiday, with 4-player local multiplayer and new minigames to play.

The beaches of Surf Island are waiting for you, so come and write the next fabulous chapter of your L.O.L. Surprise! story!

VISIT SURF ISLAND – Home of tropical new fashions, dolls, and stickers

GO TROPICAL – Unlock special Surf Island characters and costumes

BEACH PARTY! – Have local multiplayer fun with up to 4 friends

TAKE THE STAGE – Surf Island has its own concert stage, minigames, challenges, and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 /Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2500X / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 280 / Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Set sail for a tropical vacay on Surf Island – and discover fierce fashion dolls, characters, stickers and local multiplayer fun only found in this colorful paradise!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Swedish*
*languages with full audio support
